summary: Changes the Dark Brotherhood armor. But not by much.
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=Crimson]Retextures the Dark Brotherhood Assassin Armor. To look more stealthy. 
Most Dark Brotherhood Armor Retextures are just to different. But i made this one so it makes just enough of a difference to make you like the armor.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Crimson]Installation:[/COLOR]
Drag the folder "textures" in the .zip into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[COLOR=Crimson]Upcoming Features:[/COLOR]

Female Version
Some Alternate Textures.
author: Japanga
